channel.title: I have a wierd error.. please help
channel.description:
when i run my server it says choob isle (the source i am baseing my server on) is online.. but when i try to log on i get this
Choob Isle Pk v1 Now ONLINE! ClientHandler: Accepted from your-252739f5c3.home:2351 test is signing onto server. test: character file not found. test: moreinfo file not found. test: error writing file. java.io.FileNotFoundException: connectedfrom\test.txt (The system cannot find th e path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.appendConnected(client.java:10383) at client.run(client.java:10657) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) test: moreinfo file not found. test: error writing file. _: error writing file. Game saved for player _ ClientHandler: Client _ disconnected.

item.title: I have a wierd error.. please help
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

Don’t be so mean Ownage…I posted that but my internet didn’t load fully till 5 minutes after i click post, which by then you posted it…
True, read your runserver next time
